testcase.name: test_bulk_status_update
testcase.failure: tests/test_cases.py:491: in test_bulk_status_update assert response.status_code == 200, f"Expected 200, got {response.status_code}: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Expected 200, got 422: {"detail":[{"type":"missing","loc":["query","status"],"msg":"Field required","input":null,"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/missing"},{"type":"list_type","loc":["body"],"msg":"Input should be a valid list","input":{"case_ids":["case_36ffd4e3630e","case_9a0958e3b1c2"],"status":"in_progress"},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/list_type"}]} E assert 422 == 200 E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
